data.title: Saudi League: Al Ittihad join race for Lookman
data.meta_description: Saudi Arabia club Al Ittihad have tabled offer for Rave of the moment and Nigerian winger, Ademola Lookman. This was confirmed by his Italian Serie A side Atalanta. The club on Friday said they have received offers from the Saudi club and other top European teams.
data.text:
Saudi Arabia club Al Ittihad have tabled offer for Rave of the moment and Nigerian winger, Ademola Lookman.

This was confirmed by his Italian Serie A side Atalanta.

The club on Friday said they have received offers from the Saudi club and other top European teams.

“We have received an official offer from Al-Ittihad, but Atalanta has not yet received any offer, given the Saudi club’s desire to first find an agreement with us.

“There are also requests for information from other European clubs on the player’s future and their position regarding the possibility of a departure.

“We will see what is best for the player and discuss it with his clubs,” the club said.

The Nigerian International made the headlines in the team throughout last season with superb performance both in the continent and the league.

Particular note was when he scored hat-trick for Atalanta against Beyer Leverkusen in the final of Europa League which enabled his club to lift the much coveted European title.
